channel.title: closeListener()?

item.title: closeListener()?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

This is mine:

public void closeListener() { try { server.shutdownClientHandler = true; if(server.clientListener != null) server.clientListener.close(); server.clientListener = null; } catch(java.lang.Exception __ex) { __ex.printStackTrace(); } }

But when it was called, about 30 seconds went by without the listener closing, so I closed it. Everything went fine from there, but thatâ€™s the problem I encountered. Process() called for resetserver() which calls for closeListener(), and runserver(). The runserver() part worked, but not the closeListener() Any ideas?

Thanks.
